self_verifiable.prediction: Miriam will be home by 3:00 PM
self_verifiable.challenge: Requires human observation or personal confirmation
self_verifiable.verification_method: Direct confirmation from Miriam or household members

self_verifiable.prediction: I will finish reading this book tonight
self_verifiable.challenge: Personal activity that only the individual can confirm
self_verifiable.verification_method: Self-reporting with evidence (photo of completed book, etc.)

self_verifiable.prediction: My friend will call me back today
self_verifiable.verification_method: Phone call logs or personal confirmation

self_verifiable.prediction: The restaurant will have good service tonight
self_verifiable.verification_method: Customer review or personal dining experience report

self_verifiable.prediction: I will feel better after taking this medicine
self_verifiable.challenge: Personal health assessment only the individual can determine

self_verifiable.prediction: The presentation will go well tomorrow
self_verifiable.challenge: Subjective success metric requiring human evaluation
Physical condition assessment requiring visual inspection
self_verifiable.verification_method: Photo evidence and delivery condition report

self_verifiable.prediction: The new employee will fit in well with the team
self_verifiable.verification_method: Team feedback and manager assessment after probation period

self_verifiable.prediction: I will enjoy the movie we're seeing tonight
self_verifiable.challenge: Personal preference and entertainment value assessment

tool_verifiable.prediction: It will rain in New York tomorrow
tool_verifiable.verification_method: Weather API or meteorological service integration

tool_verifiable.prediction: The S&P 500 will close above 6000 today
There will be a magnitude 5+ earthquake in California this week
The website will be down for more than 1 hour today
tool_verifiable.challenge: Requires website monitoring and uptime tracking

tool_verifiable.prediction: Tesla stock will drop by 5% before market close
tool_verifiable.verification_method: Stock price API with percentage calculation

tool_verifiable.prediction: The flight AA1234 will be delayed by more than 30 minutes
The temperature will exceed 90Â°F in Phoenix today
tool_verifiable.challenge: Requires weather monitoring for specific location
tool_verifiable.verification_method: Weather service API with temperature tracking

tool_verifiable.prediction: GitHub will have a service outage lasting over 2 hours this week
tool_verifiable.verification_method: GitHub status API or service monitoring

tool_verifiable.prediction: The USD/EUR exchange rate will fall below 0.95 today

backlog_verifiable.prediction: The new iPhone will be announced next month
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires monitoring news sources and Apple announcements
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: News aggregation and Apple press release monitoring
backlog_verifiable.complexity: Medium - requires news parsing and event detection

backlog_verifiable.prediction: There will be a major data breach reported in the news this week
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires news monitoring and cybersecurity event tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Security news aggregation and breach database monitoring
backlog_verifiable.complexity: High - requires defining 'major' and reliable news sources

backlog_verifiable.prediction: A new restaurant will open on Main Street before the end of the month
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires local business monitoring and permit tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Business license databases and local news monitoring

backlog_verifiable.prediction: The Federal Reserve will announce an interest rate change this quarter
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires monitoring Fed announcements and economic news
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Federal Reserve press releases and economic news tracking

backlog_verifiable.prediction: A celebrity will announce their retirement on social media today
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires social media monitoring and celebrity account tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Social media API integration and content analysis
backlog_verifiable.complexity: High - requires defining 'celebrity' and retirement announcement detection

backlog_verifiable.prediction: A new COVID variant will be identified by WHO this month
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires health organization monitoring and variant tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: WHO announcements and health authority press releases
backlog_verifiable.complexity: Medium - requires official health organization monitoring

backlog_verifiable.prediction: A major tech company will announce layoffs exceeding 1000 employees this week
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires corporate news monitoring and employment data tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Corporate press releases and employment news aggregation
backlog_verifiable.complexity: Medium - requires defining 'major tech company' and reliable sources

backlog_verifiable.prediction: A new streaming service will launch before the end of the year
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires entertainment industry monitoring and service launch tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Entertainment news and corporate announcement monitoring

backlog_verifiable.prediction: A major sports trade will be announced in the next 48 hours
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires sports news monitoring and trade announcement tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Sports news aggregation and official team announcements
backlog_verifiable.complexity: High - requires defining 'major trade' and multiple sports coverage

backlog_verifiable.prediction: A new AI model will be released by OpenAI, Google, or Anthropic this quarter
backlog_verifiable.challenge: Requires AI industry monitoring and product release tracking
backlog_verifiable.verification_method: Company press releases and AI industry news monitoring
backlog_verifiable.complexity: Medium - requires monitoring specific companies and AI announcements

test_metadata.purpose: Test prediction verifiability categories and agent capability assessment

categories.self_verifiable: Predictions requiring human observation, personal confirmation, or subjective assessment
categories.tool_verifiable: Predictions that can be verified through APIs, data feeds, or automated monitoring tools
categories.backlog_verifiable: Predictions that could potentially be verified with complex tooling but require significant development effort
